title: Malice
description: Malice is the final book in the "Razor Saga" and wraps up a twisted tale of love that follows "Lilah", a woman who seeks pleasure in the underground,to the end of her journey...or perhaps it is the beginning. This story is very graffic in nature, hardcore erotic in the BDSM world and sure to keep you wanting more. adult only reading.
author: Rue Volley
